name: Billsco.github.io
body:
Collection of small projects which are strictly html/JS/CSS and hence can be hosted directly from their Github repository.  Slightly inconvenient as I need to work from the `gh-pages` branch vs. `master` but I can live with that for now.

Ryan Words
----------
Some of the worst JavaScript I (or anyone) has ever written, but a functioning mobile game based on jQuery mobile.  It is on my "TODO" list to fix it up (i.e. completely re-write everything).

[Game hosted by github](/ryanWords)

[Source](https://github.com/billsco/ryanWords)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
